item.title: Home Register
item.dc:creator: exporter
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_height="yes" type="image" bg_position_horizontal="right" bg_image="9469"][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_custom_heading text="BECOME OUR FRIEND" font_container="tag:h1|text_align:center|color:%23000000" use_theme_fonts="yes" letter_spacing="" css=".vc_custom_1454414058125{padding-bottom: 10px !important;}"][vc_column_text lead="yes" text_color="#000000" letter_spacing=""]

These are the most important aspects of joining our network, always free and absolutely secure.

[/vc_column_text][kleo_gap size="40px"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height="yes" content_placement="middle" css=".vc_custom_1454435895956{padding-top: 40px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;background-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.2) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;*background-color: rgb(255,255,255) !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1454435948248{border-right-width: 2px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;border-right-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.4) !important;border-right-style: solid !important;}"][kleo_gap size="40px"][kleo_grid animation="yes"][kleo_feature_item icon="users-1" icon_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.75)"]Connect with awesome new people in the newest playground of musicians and various other type of artists. Find new talents or meet your favourites.[/kleo_feature_item][kleo_feature_item icon="megaphone-1" icon_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.75)"]Keep track of all events near you and see what events your friends are attending. You can easily buy tickets online and reserve your spot at your favourite events.[/kleo_feature_item][kleo_feature_item icon="lock" icon_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.75)"]Extremely secure, you are always the one who decides what you do with your data, you can completely delete your account at any point, without any restrictions.[/kleo_feature_item][/kleo_grid][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1454435981862{padding-right: 30px !important;padding-left: 40px !important;}"][kleo_gap size="40px"][kleo_magic_container text_center="yes"][kleo_button title="Already a member? Please LOGIN here." style="link" icon="lock" uppercase="yes" letter_spacing="" el_class="kleo-show-login"][/kleo_magic_container][kleo_gap][kleo_register register_title="Register now" input_size="large" show_for_users="yes" bp_plugins_hook="no"][vc_column_text text_color="#ffffff" font_size="90%" letter_spacing="" css=".vc_custom_1455977304178{padding-top: 30px !important;}"]By registering you are agreeing with the Terms and the Privacy Statement.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][kleo_gap size="40px"][vc_column_text text_color="#ffffff" letter_spacing=""]

Faced a problem? No worries â€“ our premium class customer support service is always ready to help you.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row front_status="draft"][vc_column][kleo_magic_container float="left"][kleo_gap size="5px"][vc_custom_heading text="REGISTER NOW" font_container="tag:h3|text_align:left|color:%23000000" use_theme_fonts="yes" letter_spacing=""][/kleo_magic_container][vc_column_text lead="yes" text_color="#000000" letter_spacing=""]Connect with friends and people from around the world. Our service is free of charge and we promise we'll never sell your data, your privacy is extremely important for us.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
